name: The Duality of Cat
description:
The Duality of Cat is thus: all cats want both to be pet and to be left alone. Often even they don't know which desire takes precedence until the moment they snap. This game is gallery of quality cats for you to interact with, pet, and hope it's not a trap.

Features:

* Many good cat pics

* Fully fledged dialogue system

* Skill checks

* RPG stat customization

* Ability to pet and get bitten by cats.
